Year: Notes:		Adjustments relating to earlier months of a particular year are incorporated in the cumulative totals of that year only. It follows that the sums of the monthly figures may differ from the cumulative totals.

Hong Kong's external merchandise trade statistics are compiled based on information contained in import/export declarations. The Hong Kong Special Administrative Region is a separate customs territory
Trade Type: as stated in "The Basic Law of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China". Import/export declaration is also required of Hong Kong's merchandise trade with the mainland of China
Consignment: and statistics relating to this are included in Hong Kong's external merchandise trade statistics.

Year: Figures may not add up to total due to rounding.
Countries of consignment with nil records is omitted.

Trade Type: the country/territory of consignment is the country/territory from which the goods were consigned
Value: without any further intermediate commercial transaction. The country/territory from which the goods are consigned is not necessarily the country/territory of origin

Year: The Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region
